name: Shorten a URL using YOURLS and add it to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Use this template to automatically shorten a new link in a Google Sheets spreadsheet with YOURLS. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Q4RWkjkbge4hajelXvpG1wRciD4LN43NRoFjkBe71cY/edit?usp=sharing).
